Title: Senior Software Developer
Location: Toronto
Our client is one of the leading edge technology firms at the forefront of mobile payments innovation. We are building a revolutionary mobile commerce platform that caters to the needs of the mass market.
POSITION OVERVIEW
Our client is looking for a Senior Software Developer who has a growing skilled team that is responsible for a large-scale financial payment processing platform. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing and evaluating requirements, development of new features, and ensuring high levels of performance. A refactoring of the payments system will also be a core task.
JOB DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES
Aid in the development of the Payment Processing Platform Maintain the current codebase with bug fixes, patches, and feature requests Write technical documents that detail the functional requirement/design of code Contribute to brainstorming sessions for new features Unit testing of code to ensuring acceptable levels of unit testing Assist in deployment of web applications, and development of deployment plans Creation and maintenance of database structures
REQUIREMENTS
Personal Skill Requirements
Strong problem solving skills Motivated, self starter Excellent communication skills Team player Technical Skill Requirements
At least 3 years of Java experience (JDK1.5+) At least 3 years of J2EE experience (Servlets, JSP, EJB’s, etc) Experience with web services Extensive experience with HTML, XML (SAX/DOM/XSLT/etc) General relational database experience (comfortable with SQL DDL, DML) Database experience using MySQL 5+ Experience using database technologies (JDBC, Hibernate, etc) Struts 1 experience Experience using Eclipse Other Valueable Skills
Mobile experience Financial or payments experience Experience using Axis and other Apache Java libraries Solid web skills (JavaScript, HTML, AJAX, etc) Experience using build technologies (ANT, Maven, etc) Experience using subversion
To Apply:
If you or know of someone who is interested in this opportunity please submit your resume to hotjobs@acchuman.com. Acchuman wishes to thank all applicants but only those suitable will be contacted for an interview. Please ask about our referral program. (Mention Brendan Kim as your referral)
Ross Campbell campbell@acchuman.com executive search consultant 416-369-1515 x104
